biotools.summary: MATSAS is a package of programs that analyse small angle scattering of neutrons and X-rays data obtained from porous systems. MATSAS has initially been developed for sedimentary rocks but can be used for other microstructures such as biological macromolecules, composite nanomaterials, or polymers.
